myQuestions.question: 1. How might this dataset be cleaned?

answers.b: B: Remove fields that are not relevant for your analysis
answers.c: C: Fix spelling errors in the individual comments from participants

myQuestions.question: 2. Where does this dataset show evidence of previous preprocessing?
3. Why might it be important to preserve duplicate entries in this case?

answers.a: A: Minimize time and effort spent preprocessing
answers.b: B: The presence of duplicate entries is from a targeted email campaign, rather than errors in data entry
answers.c: C: To maintain a high number of total entries
